scripts.test: npm run test:install && elm make --docs=docs.json && elm-test && elm-review
scripts.test:install: npm run build; cd tests; node ../bin/elm-codegen install
scripts.test:pkg-generation: npm run build; cd tests/package-tests; ts-node run.ts
scripts.pkg:generate-codegen-bindings: npm run build ; npm run build:docs ; cd cli/gen-package ; ../../bin/elm-codegen install
scripts.pkg:test-install: node bin/elm-codegen src/Generate.elm --output engine --cwd cli/gen-package --debug --flags-from playground/docs/gql-docs.json
scripts.pkg:install-elm-json: (npm run build; node bin/elm-codegen install elm/json)
scripts.pkg:install-elm-core: (npm run build; node bin/elm-codegen install elm/core)
scripts.pkg:install-local-file: (npm run build; cd cli/gen-package ; ../../bin/elm-codegen install test-package-from-file/Test.elm)
scripts.play-init: (npm run build; mkdir play; cd play; node ../bin/elm-codegen init)
scripts.play-run: (npm run build; cd play; node ../bin/elm-codegen run)
scripts.play-run:debug: (npm run build; cd play; node ../bin/elm-codegen run --debug)
scripts.play:install: (npm run build; cd play; node ../bin/elm-codegen install)
scripts.play:install-codec: (npm run build; cd play; node ../bin/elm-codegen install miniBill/elm-codec)
scripts.play:install-ui: (npm run build; cd play; node ../bin/elm-codegen install mdgriffith/elm-ui)
scripts.play:install-list: (npm run build; cd play; node ../bin/elm-codegen install elm-community/list-extra)
scripts.play:install-css: (npm run build; cd play; node ../bin/elm-codegen install rtfeldman/elm-css)
scripts.play:install-browser: (npm run build; cd play; node ../bin/elm-codegen install elm/browser)
scripts.play-watch: (npm run build; cd play; node ../bin/elm-codegen run --debug --watch)
